steps.title: Type https://www.utorrent.com on the address bar located at the top of the screen.
steps.content: Type https://www.utorrent.com on the address bar located at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Click on “Download” on the green toolbar when you get to the uTorrent site.
steps.content: Click on “Download” on the green toolbar when you get to the uTorrent site.

steps.title: Click “Windows” on the right side of the page.
steps.content: Click “Windows” on the right side of the page.

steps.title: Click “Download Now” beside the label “uTorrent Stable 3.
steps.content: Click “Download Now” beside the label “uTorrent Stable 3. 4.2.”

steps.title: Click “Save” when the download window appears.
steps.content: Click “Save” when the download window appears. You will be prompted to choose where you want to save the file. Choose any folder you like. but you can also choose the desktop so it will be easier for you to find.

steps.title: Open the uTorrent installer.
steps.content: Open the uTorrent installer. When the download finishes, go to the folder or desktop where you saved the file. Double-click the downloaded file to launch the installer.

steps.title: Click “Next” on the initial page of the uTorrent setup.
steps.content: Click “Next” on the initial page of the uTorrent setup.

steps.title: Click “Next” again on the Warning page.
steps.content: Click “Next” again on the Warning page.

steps.title: Agree on the User Agreement.
steps.content: Agree on the User Agreement. Read the User Agreement and then click “I Agree” to proceed.

steps.title: Select the location in the directory where you want to save uTorrent.
steps.content: Select the location in the directory where you want to save uTorrent. By default, the program is installed in the Program Files folder. This is where most users save programs, but if you want to install it elsewhere, click on “Browse” to save the program to a custom folder of your choice. Click “Next” when you are done.

steps.title: Launch the Safari browser on your Mac.Any browser will also do.
steps.content: Launch the Safari browser on your Mac.Any browser will also do.

steps.title: Type https://www.utorrent.com on the address bar.
steps.content: Type https://www.utorrent.com on the address bar. It is located at the top of the browser interface.

steps.title: Click the “Free Download” button at the top portion of the screen.
steps.content: Click the “Free Download” button at the top portion of the screen. You will be directed to the uTorrent for Mac page. The download will start automatically.

steps.title: Go to the download section.
steps.content: Go to the download section. Click the icon at the top right of the browser. It looks like an arrow pointing down.

steps.title: Click “Open” when the pop-up notice appears.
steps.content: Click “Open” when the pop-up notice appears.

steps.title: Click “Continue” button to install the program.
steps.content: Click “Continue” button to install the program. uTorrent will be automatically installed to your Applications folder. You can drag the uTorrent icon to the Dock to create a shortcut.
